text: Coach CK takes pride and effort to understand individual kids' strength and weakness. From there, he nuture my son's strength and turn his weakness into good too. He never fail to encourage my son who is low esteem and make sure he understands every move he did and do better! Thank you Coach for coaching my son and making sure he enjoy the process of being a softball player and also a team member.

Coach CK is a dedicated coach who genuinely cares about his students. My kid looks forward to training every weekend and always comes home cheerful.

Coach CK's unwavering patience and positive approach creates an environment where my kid feels encouraged and motivated to do his very best.

Picked my nephew up once in a while from his practice. Hence last week I decided to head down earlier to see his trainings.

I must applaud to Coach CK for his dedication and commitment for the every trainings. Coach CK is a head coach for Softball Maris Stella High and also did well for NSG. Although he’s always busy with games and trainings, I can see a big difference in my nephew’s performance in his skillsets during the game.

Strongly recommended for parents who wishes to see your children playing in a higher level for Softball.

Coach CK and his team of coaches are truly remarkable! They worked closely with my younger brother, helping him improve his skills and confidence, which led to his best-ever performance during the National Primary School Games. Their dedication, expertise, and personalized approach make a huge difference for players at any level. Coach CK and his team not only focus on the technical aspects of the game but also inspire teamwork, discipline, and passion. We’re incredibly grateful for their support and would highly recommend them to anyone looking for quality softball coaching! We even continued to his U14 age group class!

Coach CK is an exception softball coach who has made a significant on 2 of my sons' lives. His patience, enthusiasm, and expertise helped my sons develop his softball skills and build confidence in their abilities. The coach's emphasis on teamwork, sportsmanship, and respect for the game resonated deeply with my sons and our entire family. We feel really fortunate to have Coach CK as our sons' coach.
